seo.title: Westchester County Market Report February 2026 | Pinnacle Realty Group
seo.description: Westchester County real estate market data for February 2026. Median price $875K, 24-day avg DOM, 103% sale-to-list ratio. Full neighborhood breakdown.

body:
## Market Summary

February 2026 continues the pattern established throughout late 2025: strong buyer demand meeting compressed supply. The result is a market that firmly favors sellers — but only those who price and present their homes correctly.

## Price Trends

The median sale price of $875,000 represents a 6.2% year-over-year increase. Luxury properties ($2M+) saw the strongest appreciation at 8.1%, driven by continued demand from financial sector professionals and international buyers.

## Inventory Analysis

With only 342 active listings across Westchester, buyers face intense competition for quality homes. Well-prepared, move-in-ready properties in top school districts are typically seeing 3-8 offers within the first weekend.

## Outlook

The spring market (March-June) will be the most competitive window of 2026. Buyers who are pre-approved and working with an experienced local agent will have the clearest advantage.
title: Westchester County Market Report — February 2026
excerpt: Inventory remains compressed, prices continue upward, and buyer demand shows no signs of slowing. Here's the full picture for February 2026.
